sourceMeaningMnemonic: You put <radical>flowers</radical> on your <radical>scooter</radical> and your <radical>car</radical>. The flowers you put on them are <kanji>lotus</kanji> flowers.
meaningInfo: Imagine placing lotuses on top of your scooter and car. They are the right kind of flowers for these vehicles.
readingMnemonic: You're putting a <kanji>lotus</kanji> on both your scooter and car because they are <reading>ren</reading>tals (<ja>れん</ja>).
readingInfo: You always put a lotus on top of your rental cars and scooters. Come up with a personal reason why you do this.
